failures.must-wear-watch: You must wear the device to control your SmartDrive.
failures.title: Notice
failures.not-fully-initialized: PushTracker is still initializing the connection to the server, your settings will be sent at a later time.
failures.no-auth-for-saving: To (optionally) save your settings to the server, you should connect your PushTracker WearOS app to your PushTracker mobile app. To do so, please follow the instructions in the 'Device Setup' page of the PushTracker mobile app.
failures.not-connected-to-mobile: Could not authenticate with server, please re-connect with PushTracker mobile app.
failures.could-not-update-profile: Could not update user profile on the server

notifications.foreground-service: Permobil PushTracker is analyzing your activity.

permissions-reasons.fine-location: To measure distance using your SmartWatch GPS need ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION permission.
permissions-reasons.coarse-location: To communicate to the PushTracker mobile app on your iPhone using bluetooth we need ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION permission.
permissions-reasons.phone-state: To read your device serial number (for warranty / support purposes) we need the READ_PHONE_STATE permission.

coastgoal.description: Your goal for average coast time between pushes each day.
coastgoal.title: Coast Goal

distancegoal.description: Your goal for distanced traveled in your wheelchair each day.
distancegoal.title: Distance Goal

pushsensitivity.description: Controls how sensitive the push detection is - 0% detects fewer pushes, 100% detects more pushes.
pushsensitivity.title: Push Sensitivity

units.description: The unit system or units of measure to display the measurements within the user interfaces. Select either Imperial [ft / mi and lbs] or Metric [cm / km and kg].
units.title: Units

errors.bad-data: Invalid data received from PushTracker mobile app - please check your connection and try again.
errors.bad-authorization: Invalid account authorization data received from PushTracker mobile app - please ensure your account information is up to date and you have a network connecction to the backend.
